description: [WarzoneRAT](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0670)  can perform COM hijacking by setting the path to itself to the `HKCU\Software\Classes\Folder\shell\open\command` key with a `DelegateExecute` parameter.(Citation: Check Point Warzone Feb 2020)

external_references.description: Harakhavik, Y. (2020, February 3). Warzone: Behind the enemy lines. Retrieved December 17, 2021.
